title: Best of The Herd for May 06, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 06, 2020
description:
College Football is going to be played this season but not at every school

This Bulls documentary reminds Colin how much better the NBA is now without Centers

Sports need people like Dana White

Are we sure Big Ben is going to be great when he comes back?

5 Things in sports you need to just accept. Don't @ me, bro

Guest: Urban Meyer, FOX College Football Analyst & 3x National Champion 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
